comment.body: Hello, So I am new to the site and all of this is just... Overwhelming, could I hire a few of the Zero Net Dev team for a month or two, call it a split test, you have your lay out, I want to take all these same functions, understand them and organize them into a user friendly layout. I got $10 to spend as the budget, and once done we have the people to start moving your site and its app... It is just... Too much in it's current form.
$10,000 dollars for the project budget (sorry, typoed)
